awards.text: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 3 wins & 5 nominations.

fullplot: Walter Lee Younger is a young man struggling with his station in life. Sharing a tiny apartment with his wife, son, sister and mother, he seems like an imprisoned man. Until, that is, the family gets an unexpected financial windfall...
plot: A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.
title: A Raisin in the Sun
